channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What credit score do you need to be approved for the Chase Sapphire Preferred Card?
item.description: The Chase Sapphire Preferred Card is a longtime favorite among award travelers. Here's what credit score you typically need to be approved for the car...

item.title: New tools: How to use Google Flights to find cheap flights
item.description: Here's everything you need to know about how to search for discounts, deals and fare sales like a pro on Google Flights.

item.title: These 6 business cards can help you stay under Chase’s 5/24 rule
item.description: Most business cards, including some from Chase, don't count toward your 5/24 status. By getting business cards you can stay eligible for Chase's perso...

item.title: Texas-sized fanfare: EVA Air's swanky premium economy makes US debut on DFW inaugural
item.description: Taiwan-based EVA Air launched nonstop service from Dallas Fort Worth International Airport to Taipei, debuting the airline's new premium economy seats...

item.title: Why should you upgrade from the Citi Strata to Citi Strata Premier?
item.description: Citi Strata cardholders enjoy no annual fee and great bonus categories. Here's why an upgrade to the Citi Strata Premier may present better value.
